insert into am_statement_collection(PRODUCT_CODE,SERVICE_TYPE ,TIME, AREA, MERCHANT, SHOP_NAME, MATERIAL_CODE, MATERIAL_NAME, DEVICE_TYPE, PRICE, PRICE_NUM, REBATE, REBATE_NUM, AFTER_REBATE_NUM, AFTER_REBATE_PRICE, SALES_QUANTITY, CUSTOMER_CODE, CUSTOMER_NAME, SALE_GROUP_CODE, SALE_GROUP_NAME, WAREHOUSE_CODE, WAREHOUSE_NAME, STATUS, REASONS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DATE, DELETED_FLAG,WORK_ORDER) values
(#{item.productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.serviceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.merchant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.priceNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.rebate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.rebateNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.afterRebateNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.afterRebatePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.salesQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.saleGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.saleGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.reasons,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.deletedFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.workOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
